pullrequest.title: Support custom material scripts for heightmaps

content.raw:
[xenial is not happy](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/201//consoleFull)

~~~
gazebo/rendering/Heightmap.cc: In constructor ���gazebo::rendering::TerrainMaterial::TerrainMaterial(Ogre::String)���:
gazebo/rendering/Heightmap.cc:3114:53: error: invalid new-expression of abstract class type ���gazebo::rendering::TerrainMaterial::Profile���
       "Profile for rendering Ogre standard material"));
                                                     ^
In file included from gazebo/rendering/Heightmap.cc:47:0:
gazebo/rendering/HeightmapPrivate.hh:251:13: note:   because the following virtual functions are pure within ���gazebo::rendering::TerrainMaterial::Profile���:

             ^

/usr/include/OGRE/Terrain/OgreTerrainMaterialGenerator.h:192:17: note: 	virtual void Ogre::TerrainMaterialGenerator::Profile::setLightmapEnabled(bool)
